articles.title: U.S. Treasury says consumer leases can qualify for EV tax credits - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. Treasury Department said Thursday that electric vehicles leased by consumers starting Jan. 1 can qualify for up to $7,500 in commercial clean vehicle tax credits, a decision that makes those assembled outside North America eligible.

articles.title: Column: Southwest's meltdown was born in America's cheapskate corporate culture - Yahoo Finance
